title: Painting an abstraction
brief_description: Eliot O’Hara, American artist and teacher, presents his own technique of “abstracting” desired elements for a water-colour painting. He emphasises the careful arrangement of planes and colour in a unique pattern. The same subject - treated in the film “Painting reflections in water” is used to show how purpose influences choice and technique.
